Package de.axnsoftware.settings

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBackingStore
    The interface IBackingStore models a backing store which is responsible for both retrieving configuration data from and persistently storing configuration data to an underlying storage.
    ISettings
    The interface ISettings models a service by which one can access properties loaded from the underlying ISettingsStore.
    ISettingsStore
    The interface ISettingsStore models a service for loading and storing properties from and to an underlying backing store represented by an instance of the IBackingStore interface.
    ITypeMapper
    The interface ITypeMapper models a mapper that is responsible for reading and writing a given object from and to a given backing store.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SettingsStoreFactory
    The final class SettingsStoreFactory models a factory for instances of the ISettingsStore interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EFileFormat
    The enum EFileFormat defines the various file formats that can be read or written out by file based implementations of the IBackingStore interface.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Property
    The annotation Property must be present on all fields of a PropertyClass which should be read from or written to the backend store.
    PropertyClass
    The annotation PropertyClass must be applied to all user defined classes representing property containers.
